subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Miami Dolphins owner Wayne Huizenga said he is “not actively looking to sell” the team despite frustration over a winless season, but he has confirmed talking with potential buyers since April. Huizenga issued a statement Saturday in response to reports he is discussing the sale of his franchise and Dolphin Stadium to two real estate developers.
